short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build a list of notes which needs to be copied throughout the whole day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, users can create a list of items/notes that they can easily click to copy. Notes can be added and removed from the list as the user wants.
